review: It was everything it was advertised as. Easy to use.
author: Alice K. Collins

review: The FIre Stick is so easy to install and gives you access to Movies and TV from Prime, HBO, Netflix, Hulu and many more.
author: bettempol@gma7

review: I liked it up until it stopped picking up my Wi-Fi signal after less than a week.
author: Hugh O'Brien

review: the stick worked like a charm the first night -- since then I have been unable to connect it to the wireless in my house. It keeps saying that I don't have the correct wireless password...and yet, that same password works with all other devices in my house. It's been very frustrating.
author: Brooke D.

review: It works really well, and I get Amazon movies for free.
author: James Glantz

review: Fire stick is awesome.  Great apps, easy to use.
author: Amazon Customer

review: The fire stick works well, however the services provided through the fire stick I find to be lacking. Especially the Amazon portion. Even as a prime member, I found it very expensive. $2.14 for one episode of a Sponge Bob cartoon. I had hoped for more for my $99 a year.
author: Kevin Getty

review: Super easy to set up and use. We are loving it!
author: Lisa

review: This device is so much easier to transport than the Fire TV! It has all the same benefits as the Fire TV but at a lower cost and smaller size
author: Tyler Porter
